questions.question: Which virtualization technology isolates applications from the underlying operating system?

content: To verify the identity of the certificate holder.
To request a CA to generate the certificate.
To encrypt communications on a web server.

content: Provides error checking for packet integrity
Routes data packets to their destination
Defines the addressing scheme for network devices
